slogan.multi: [fr]Squelettes complets SPIP 3 + Z-core[en]Full 'Z like' template for SPIP 3

description.multi: [fr]ZKTX, squelette HTML5 pour SPIP 3 + Z-core. Inspirés de ZPIP, de BoilerPlate, Initializ'r et de tous ceux qui ont bien voulu partager leurs connaissances vers le template ultime :-) [en]ZKTX : HTML5 skeleton for SPIP 3 + Z-core. Inspired by ZPIP, BoilerPlate, Initializ'r and all those who shared their knowledge, leading to the perfect template :-)
